full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/14/2023 AFFIDAVIT OF BIRTH I, Gurmej Singh Takhar, presently residing at 1171 Robert Drive, Yuba City, California 95991, first being duly sworn depose and declare as follows: That I am a permanent resident of the United States of America. My Alien Registration Number is FOIA (b)(6) That I was born on January 12, 1930 in Village Bilga, District Jalandhar, Punjab, India. That I am formerly of Village Shankar, District Jalandhar, Punjab, India. That this affidavit is prepared in reference to Tara Singh Dhesi, presently residing at 951 Railroad Avenue, Yuba City, California 95991. That I personally know Kartar Singh and his wife Karam Kaur of Village Dhesian Kahna, District Jalandhar, Punjab, India. That Tara Singh Dhesi was born from the wedlock of Kartar Singh and his wife Karam Kaur on September 13, 1948 in Village Mothada Kalan, District Jalandhar, Punjab, India. That Kartar Singh's family and my family used to visit each other often during special occasions such as birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, and religious ceremonies. That if any further information is required, please feel free to contact me. That I further affirm the knowledge that swearing to any false statements while under oath constitutes the crimes of perjury. GURMETSTAKHAR Gurmej Singh Takhar SUBSCRIBED AND SWORN TO BEFORE ME THIS 10TH DAY OF August 1990 Kalwat NOTARY PUBLIC, & Jack OFFICIAL SEAL CALIFORNIA KULWANT S. JOHL NOTARY PUBLIC - CALIFORNIA SUTTER COUNTY My Comm. Expires June 18, 1993
